Associate Newsletter August 2012
MBO & Zintro Expand Business Development Opportunities Looking for new clients? Who isn't? Recently announced in a press release <http://www.mbopartners.com/news-events/mbo-partners-and-zintro-expand-business-development-opportunities-independent-profession>, we are pleased to report that MBO Partners has forged a relationship with Zintro.com <http://info.zintro.com/MBO-ExSU?aff=_MBO-NV>. Zintro provides lead generation for consultants and other subject-matter experts. Zintro's Basic services are free and MBO has arranged for a deep discount for its associates to upgrade to Zintro's Premium Services. MBO Partners is committed to building strategic partnerships that enable the growth of the independent consulting sector. Click here to learn more about Zintro <http://info.zintro.com/MBO-ExSU?aff=_MBO-NV>.
Make Meaningful Connections Via NEW Networking Tool MBO Access Announced in a recent press release <http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20120619006336/en/MBO-Partners-Launches-Private-Social-Business-Platform>, MBO Partners launched a new, free online networking platform called MBO Access. This online private community was built to enable our Associates to better and more easily connect and network with other Associates, Alumni, and with major MBO clients. Our Associates have access to rich resources, special promotions, and information leading to potential new projects and opportunities. Interested in joining? Contact your Business Manager today! MBO & Club Quarters to Offer Associates Affiliate Discount Hotel Rates MBO Partners is proud to announce an exclusive partnership with Club Quarters, a line of full service hotels, primarily designed for the business traveler. MBO has absorbed the yearly membership dues, so you can enjoy lower rates without the annual fee, which translates to an estimated cost savings of $1,500! Having several locations in prime business areas with a full range of services geared toward business will allow a cleaner, quieter and safer stay during your travel. Locations include NY, Washington DC, San Francisco, Chicago, Boston, just to name a few. Members receive lower rates and priority reservations. To take advantage of this offer, contact lebert@mbopartners.com <mailto:lebert@mbopartners.com> for the discount code.
MBO APPOINTS NEW INDEPENDENT CONSULTANT EXECUTIVE BOARD In our continuous mission to provide MBO Associates with optimal product and service solutions to succeed in their independent careers, we are excited to share that we have developed the MBO Independent Consulting Executive Board (ICEB). We have appointed 7 MBO Associates of diverse experience and backgrounds to the ICEB, whose mission is to provide MBO Partners with valuable insight and advice that will have significant impact and influence on the company's service levels, product development offerings, market intelligence, market strategies and policies. MBO is diligently focused on going even further to understand the needs of the Independent Consulting community. Stay tuned for a press release introducing our new Board! DID YOU KNOW? - You may be eligible for expense reimbursement for your Dependent Care Costs! View the details under the Resources Section <https://app1.mbopartners.com/servlet/entry?display=DocumentLinkPageInformation> of your MBO Business Center. - MBO is portable! Once your contract wraps up, you can take us to your next client. Contact your Business Manager for more information on how to introduce MBO to your new Client. - MBO will review, edit, and propose changes to Master Service Agreements, contracts, purchase orders, SOW's, and any other legal paperwork needed to engage with a client.
CEO CORNER First Day on a Client Site - Start off on the right foot
Embarking on a new assignment at the client site can understandably be met with a barrage of emotions – excitement, fear, anxiety, motivation, trepidation, just to name a few.
This heightened sense of self-awareness is attributed to the fact that making that first impression is of paramount importance. The goal is to stand out in a big way, and this is how. More> <http://info.mbopartners.com/CEOCornerAug2012.html> BOOK REVIEW Jay Lash, VP Market Strategies DISHES on 'Steve Jobs' BOOK

We both grew up in the suburbs of a technology center in the 1960s, both sons of engineers, became hippies and later sold out to enter business. That’s where the similarities ended...
